etymology.description: phonetic 甫(甫) (fǔ, "garden") + semantic 寸(寸) (cùn, "hand") = distributing crops -> spreading
etymology.interpretation: The character 尃 combines 甫(甫) (fǔ, "garden") as the phonetic part, with 寸(寸) (cùn, "hand") indicating the action of distributing, which together suggest the idea of spreading or distributing crops. This reflects the original agricultural context of spreading or distributing seeds or plants by hand.
